title: So since you're giving utterly oppressive champions like Zoe counterplay

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dzK3Emcj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-28T22:12:42.128+0000)
>
> Wat?
> 
> Zoe just got gutted.

Yeah, that's the point. She was given counterplay.

still needs more imo. I hate the champion with every fiber of my being.
Good fap material nothing more tho tbh

> [{quoted}](name=Pupel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dzK3Emcj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-02-28T22:34:03.682+0000)
>
> Wait yorick is oppressive?

Have you ever played against Yorick?

At level 6, you have two choices. Fight him and get blown up by his ultimate or back away and let him take your tower.

Oh wait, that's no choice at all.

> [{quoted}](name=Frontline Fury,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dzK3Emcj,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-03-01T13:15:05.930+0000)
>
> Have you ever played against Yorick?
> 
> At level 6, you have two choices. Fight him and get blown up by his ultimate or back away and let him take your tower.
> 
> Oh wait, that's no choice at all.

I mean cut the champ some slack outside of lane he just attempts to split push because he cant do anything else. At least he is good at getting first tower I don't see anything wrong with that.

> [{quoted}](name=Pupel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dzK3Emcj,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-03-01T14:15:43.208+0000)
>
> I mean cut the champ some slack outside of lane he just attempts to split push because he cant do anything else. At least he is good at getting first tower I don't see anything wrong with that.

Nasus is the same. Yet he has distinct counterplay.

Yorick is like Illaoi - the primary strategy against them is "outnumber them 4 to 1". That's not counterplay. There's nothing any individual player can do. No strategy, no skill matchup, no champion pick.

> [{quoted}](name=Frontline Fury,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dzK3Emcj,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-01T16:47:29.088+0000)
>
> Nasus is the same. Yet he has distinct counterplay.
> 
> Yorick is like Illaoi - the primary strategy against them is "outnumber them 4 to 1". That's not counterplay. There's nothing any individual player can do. No strategy, no skill matchup, no champion pick.

His counterplay is dodge the E and hit the cage
Yorick needs a nerf? Buy grievous wounds/ninja tabis..

> [{quoted}](name=Odysseus263,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dzK3Emcj,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-02-28T22:56:38.360+0000)
>
> Yorick needs a nerf? Buy grievous wounds/ninja tabis..

Have you ever played against Yorick? Building armor is completely pointless as his ultimate deals magic damage.
but his Q is where most of his damage comes from.. same with his ghouls..
